name: Alien
description: You are not of this Earth. Perhaps you were born on another planet, created in a lab beyond the stars, or are the last survivor of an ancient galactic race.
advantages: You begin with the Superpower Advantage for free.
disadvantages: You suffer a -2 penalty to Social rolls with non-aliens unless disguised or acclimated.

name: Supernatural
description: You are touched by forces beyond mortal comprehension—magic, gods, curses, or eldritch energies shape your being.
advantages: You begin with the Mystic Power Advantage or gain a free Rank 1 Power with the Mystic Source tag.
disadvantages: Your supernatural aura is detectable by those sensitive to such forces.

name: Highly Trained
description: You are not superhuman—you’re just better. Peak human ability, years of training, and relentless will have honed you into a weapon.
advantages: Gain one extra Proficiency in any skill of your choice.
disadvantages: You do not gain any Powers from your Origin.

name: Mutant
description: You were born different. Your powers manifested from your DNA, possibly from latent genes, exposure, or trauma.
advantages: Gain a Rank 1 Power with the Mutant Source tag for free.
disadvantages: Your genetic signature can be tracked or detected by specialized equipment.

name: Tech Augmented
description: You were enhanced with technology—cybernetics, nanites, exo-suits, or neural implants.
advantages: You may choose one Rank 1 Power with the Tech Source tag.
disadvantages: If deprived of your tech (EMP, hacking), you lose access to your Power until restored.
